description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.FntzcwdxSJAv1Z0e]{Expeditious Retreat}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.sCj52FViHvO8Ye31]{Instant Friends}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Svt8bQokwOmfHrGe]{Shield}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.E2ZIhScB3kfs08H7]{Spectral Image}
